ClassDesc: - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, cursors returned from related queries will be empty. Constants for the stream_item_photos table, which contains photos associated with social stream updates. Access to social stream photos requires additional permissions beyond the read/write contact permissions required by the provider. Querying for social stream photos requires android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM permission, and inserting or updating social stream photos requires android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM permission. The content URIs to the insert, update and delete operations are required to have the account information matching that of the owning raw contact as query parameters, namely @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#SyncColumns#ACCOUNT_TYPE_E@ and @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#SyncColumns#ACCOUNT_NAME_E@. @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#RawContactsColumns#DATA_SET_E@ isn't required.
